video.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender
video.synopsis: In an all-new series, five unlikely heroes and their flying robot lions unite to form the megapowerful Voltron and defend the universe from evil.

episodes.synopsis: Overwhelmed but ready for action, five aspiring space explorers learn they have the power to create Voltron, the most powerful robot in the universe.
episodes.title: The Rise of Voltron

episodes.synopsis: Princess Allura puts the Paladins through training when they start to lose their focus. They'll need to cooperate to learn how to form Voltron.
episodes.title: Some Assembly Required

episodes.synopsis: Shiro must draw on painful memories from his past when a massive evil robot threatens the peace on Arus, forcing the lions into action.
episodes.title: Return of the Gladiator

episodes.synopsis: As one Paladin threatens to leave the team, invaders storm the castle and destroy its power crystal in an attempt to steal Voltron.
episodes.title: Fall of the Castle of Lions

episodes.synopsis: Hunk and Coran try to retrieve a new crystal from the Balmera while the rest of the team work to prevent Sendak from leaving the castle with Voltron.
episodes.title: Tears of the Balmera

episodes.synopsis: On the way to the Balmera, the team stops to help two rebels on the run from the Galra. Lance is trusting, but Hunk is skeptical of their intentions.
episodes.title: Taking Flight

episodes.synopsis: Allura, Coran and the Paladins return to the Balmera to free the natives, but the arrival of a Galra ship could force Voltron into action.
episodes.title: Return to the Balmera

episodes.synopsis: As the Paladins scramble to ward off a Galra monster, Allura hopes that her ancient powers can heal the Balmera and save its people.
episodes.title: Rebirth

episodes.synopsis: Allura considers making a heartbreaking sacrifice to save the team when the castle mysteriously turns on them and sends them hurtling toward doom.
episodes.title: Crystal Venom

episodes.synopsis: The team stops at an isolated and seemingly insignificant Galra space station and discovers how the empire is gathering its energy from the universe.
episodes.title: Collection and Extraction

episodes.synopsis: Zarkon lures Voltron into a battle on his ship, and when one of the lions is captured the team must get creative to defeat the Galra and return home.
episodes.title: The Black Paladin

episodes.synopsis: The lions get separated when a trip through a wormhole goes awry, while Coran and Allura scramble to break free of a seemingly endless time loop.
episodes.title: Across the Universe

episodes.synopsis: Hunk and Lance crash-land underwater and follow a mermaid to a civilization whose queen promises to keep them safe and help find the others.
episodes.title: The Depths

episodes.synopsis: After being saved from a dangerous situation by an unexpected ally, Shiro urges the rest of the team to trust his rescuer.
episodes.title: Shiro's Escape

episodes.synopsis: While making repairs to the castle, the Paladins encounter unusual spongy spores that lead them to a planet of brilliant engineers.
episodes.title: Greening the Cube

episodes.synopsis: Exhausted after a battle, the crew must spring back into action when Zarkon's forces track them down. Coran gets infected by a slippery virus.
episodes.title: Eye of the Storm

episodes.synopsis: Four of the Paladins head to a ravaged planet called Taujeer to help the citizens escape, while Allura and Keith go off on a separate mission.
episodes.title: The Ark of Taujeer

episodes.synopsis: Shiro attempts to create a deeper bond with the Black Lion, while Coran takes the others to a swap meet, where they have some strange adventures.
episodes.title: Space Mall

episodes.synopsis: Keith and Shiro travel to a hard-to-find base in an effort to align with the Blade of Marmora. Keith must fight to unlock the truth about his past.
episodes.title: The Blade of Marmora

episodes.synopsis: The Paladins split up to gather resources for a showdown with Zarkon. Hunk and Keith travel into the belly of a planet-devouring creature.
episodes.title: The Belly of the Weblum

episodes.synopsis: Lance, Pidge and Shiro infiltrate a facility to free a prisoner of the Galra, but Lance and Shiro each think they've found the right inmate.
episodes.title: Escape from Beta Traz

episodes.synopsis: Allura travels to the Balmera to acquire a powerful crystal, but a visit from an evil beast prompts her to call on the Paladins for help.
episodes.title: Stayin' Alive

episodes.synopsis: After acquiring the teludav from the Olkari, the team prepares to launch the operation to defeat Zarkon and bring peace to the universe.
episodes.title: Best Laid Plans

episodes.synopsis: The Paladins fight an epic battle against the most powerful enemy they've ever faced, with the fate of the universe at stake.
episodes.title: Blackout

episodes.synopsis: As the Paladins work to build a coalition of rebels, Allura makes a suggestion that rattles the team. A new face aims to gain power with the Galra.
episodes.title: Changing of the Guard

episodes.synopsis: Lotor's forces move to retake the planet Puig and lure the Paladins out for a fight. Keith and Lance struggle to adjust to big changes.
episodes.title: Red Paladin

episodes.synopsis: Keith's reckless choice leads the team into a dangerous situation, and Allura needs to channel one of the Paladins to get out of trouble.
episodes.title: The Hunted

episodes.synopsis: The castle receives a distress signal that leads Allura and Coran to believe that they may not be the only surviving Alteans.
episodes.title: Hole in the Sky

episodes.synopsis: A pair of skeptical rebel fighters make things difficult for a Paladin in need of assistance. Haggar steps up her monitoring of Lotor.
episodes.title: The Journey

episodes.synopsis: As the Paladins pursue the comet, they become confused by Lotor's actions. Keith doubts his leadership skills, while Lance ponders his future.
episodes.title: Tailing a Comet

episodes.synopsis: As the team tries to decipher Lotor's plan for the comet, Coran gives the Paladins a history lesson about the origins of Voltron and the ongoing war.
episodes.title: The Legend Begins

episodes.synopsis: Keith's divided attentions cause tension within the team at a time when unity is crucial. The Blades investigate a Galra supply route.
episodes.title: Code of Honor

episodes.synopsis: Pidge gets information that prompts her to embark on an important solo mission to the far reaches of the universe.
episodes.title: Reunion

episodes.synopsis: An internal struggle for power erupts within the Galra. Pidge returns to the castle with some precious cargo. The team gets a cow.
episodes.title: Black Site

episodes.synopsis: Coran gets carried away with turning the Paladins into intergalactic stars when he designs an elaborate, effects-filled live tour of the universe.
episodes.title: The Voltron Show!

episodes.synopsis: Team Voltron devises a plan to continue the coalition's momentum and take control of more Galra territory. Lotor makes a big move.
episodes.title: Begin the Blitz

episodes.synopsis: Forces of good and evil converge on the planet Naxzela, where Voltron faces unforeseen danger only one Paladin can help them escape.
episodes.title: A New Defender

episodes.synopsis: After a daring mission at a key Galra outpost, the team considers a risky alliance. One Paladin leads a journey to retrieve an important prisoner.
episodes.title: The Prisoner

episodes.synopsis: Faced with a painful decision, the Paladins reluctantly come to an agreement with Zarkon. Haggar comes to grips with memories from the past.
episodes.title: Blood Duel

episodes.synopsis: A power struggle erupts within the Galra. As the Paladins argue over their next move, an attack forces them to save themselves and the Olkari.
episodes.title: Postmortem

episodes.synopsis: Shiro acts against the wishes of the other Paladins. Powerful Galra from around the empire convene for the Kral Zera ceremony.
episodes.title: Kral Zera

episodes.synopsis: Keith is sent to find a fellow Blade named Krolia and locate a powerful weapon. Lance, Hunk and Pidge reprogram a robot to have fun.
episodes.title: Bloodlines

episodes.synopsis: The team searches for a portal to a mysterious, fabled Altean land called Oriande. Shiro starts to feel like there’s something wrong with him.
episodes.title: White Lion

episodes.synopsis: An attack by Sendak prompts the Paladins to scramble to a planet's defense. Lotor calls on Allura for help in assembling a powerful ship.
episodes.title: Omega Shield

episodes.synopsis: Keith's journey to an abyss to search for a quintessence source unlocks memories about his past. Lance wallows in unrequited love.
episodes.title: Razor's Edge

episodes.synopsis: When the team takes a break to play a magical role-playing game, their fantasy world sparks useful ideas to help them solve real-world problems.
episodes.title: Monsters & Mana

episodes.synopsis: After Lotor and Allura head off in the new ship, the remaining Paladins get a dire warning that could change everything.
episodes.title: The Colony

episodes.synopsis: As one Paladin takes on a dangerous mission through a wormhole, the others contend with failing controls on the castle.
episodes.title: The Black Paladins

episodes.synopsis: A metaphysical encounter shines light on a Paladin's fate. Lance and Allura console each other about their past judgments. Lotor makes a plea.
episodes.title: All Good Things

episodes.synopsis: An epic battle leaves the universe in a state of chaos, threatening to destroy all life unless a sacrifice is made.
episodes.title: Defender of All Universes

episodes.synopsis: Part of the group gets stuck on a planet where they're inadvertently miniaturized. Flashbacks reveal the beginnings of Keith and Shiro's relationship.
episodes.title: A Little Adventure

episodes.synopsis: The Paladins stop at a base that belongs to the Blades, only to find it's been abandoned. But they come under attack before they can investigate.
episodes.title: The Road Home

episodes.synopsis: Stuck in a perilous situation far from home and needing help to get free, the Paladins realize their fate is in Coran's hands.
episodes.title: The Way Forward

episodes.synopsis: The Paladins inexplicably become contestants on the crazy game show "Garfle Warfle Snick." But they're playing for much more than cash and prizes.
episodes.title: The Feud!

episodes.synopsis: When Pidge intercepts a distress signal that the Paladins believe they recognize, the team ends up on a ruined planet that was ravaged by war.
episodes.title: The Ruins

episodes.synopsis: As the Paladins hurtle through space, they enter a seemingly endless void that tests their sanity -- and their loyalty to one another.
episodes.title: The Journey Within

episodes.synopsis: The Paladins receive a distress signal that's explained through a flashback to Pidge's father Sam's return to Earth four years earlier.
episodes.title: The Last Stand, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Sam and the others at the Garrison attempt to hold off the Galra attacks in hopes that a desperate plea for help will reach Voltron.
episodes.title: The Last Stand, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The Paladins drop off the Lions and head to Earth, believing that information Sam acquired years earlier could help them battle Sendak.
episodes.title: Know Your Enemy

episodes.synopsis: The Paladins work with the Garrison pilots on a mission that could provide more clues about how to take down Sendak's operation.
episodes.title: Heart of the Lion

episodes.synopsis: Sanda's revelation shakes the Paladins, who are separated from the Lions. On Earth, Shiro, Sam and Coran attempt to get the Atlas powered up.
episodes.title: Trial by Fire

episodes.synopsis: As a massive battle rages on, Shiro goes solo on a dangerous mission to bring down Sendak and save his friends -- and his home.
episodes.title: Lions' Pride, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: With the future of Earth hanging in the balance, Voltron and the others come together to face a mysterious enemy unlike any they've ever seen.
episodes.title: Lions' Pride, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The Paladins spend one last night on Earth in preparation for the launch of the Atlas. Lance works up the courage to ask Allura an important question.
episodes.title: Launch Date

episodes.synopsis: Flashbacks shine a light on Honerva's past with Lotor and Zarkon, revealing the motivation for her recent actions.
episodes.title: Shadows

episodes.synopsis: After taking control of a Galra base on a dark planet, the Paladins follow a distress signal from a missing fleet and make an unsettling discovery.
episodes.title: The Prisoner's Dilemma

episodes.synopsis: While floating through the universe searching for signs of a Robeast, the Paladins head toward Olkarion and realize they aren't alone on their journey.
episodes.title: Battle Scars

episodes.synopsis: The Paladins make plans to meet with the Atlas, but the reunion is interrupted when the Lions are ambushed by a mysterious adversary.
episodes.title: The Grudge

episodes.synopsis: Voltron heads to Oriande to confront Honerva after the team discovers she's using wormholes to harvest massive amounts of Quintessence.
episodes.title: Genesis

episodes.synopsis: Pilots Kinkade and Rizavi provide a documentary-style look at both the lighthearted and stressful moments of day-to-day life on the Atlas.
episodes.title: Day Forty-Seven

episodes.synopsis: The crew heads to the planet Drazan to participate in the festivities of Clear Day, but Allura is plagued by nightmares when she stays behind to rest.
episodes.title: Clear Day

episodes.synopsis: The Paladins travel into an expansive void accessed through Allura's mind, where they encounter frightening spirits and cursed souls.
episodes.title: Knights of Light, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Traveling further into an abyss of memories, the Paladins make shocking discoveries that could alter their reality forever.
episodes.title: Knights of Light, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: As Honerva gets closer to creating a catastrophic rift in reality, the Atlas crew races against time to figure out how to locate and stop her.
episodes.title: Uncharted Regions

episodes.synopsis: Confronted by a dark energy like nothing they've faced before, the Paladins must draw on their everlasting bond -- and a few Balmera -- to forge ahead.
episodes.title: The Zenith

episodes.synopsis: Voltron and Honerva come together at the source of all realities in the ultimate battle between good and evil for the survival of the universe.
episodes.title: The End Is the Beginning
